faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

faq.a1: PASIFLOW is a passive income platform that organizes high-yield, professionally managed, turnkey real estate investments in the USA on behalf of investors.
faq.q2: Can I manage my investment remotely?

faq.a3: No. PASIFLOW is an actively field-operating structure. We have our own management teams and technicians in all states where we work.
faq.q4: Who handles tenant finding and management?

faq.q8: What is the net rental yield?
faq.a8: Net returns are in the 10% – 14% NET range. This represents net income after all expenses are deducted.
faq.q9: Do you provide support for tax and accounting matters?

faq.a13: PASIFLOW is designed for busy professionals, those wanting to invest from abroad to the USA, and investors who don't want to deal with property management.
faq.q14: Can I invest without being a U.S. citizen?

faq.a17: Yes. PASIFLOW supports growing your passive income with multiple properties by building a portfolio.

whyUsa.title: Why Invest in USA?
whyUsa.subtitle: Dollar-based passive income, strong property rights, and a transparent system.
whyUsa.intro: Our goal with PASIFLOW is simple: Minimize risk with the right properties in the right cities in the USA and create long-term regular cash flow.
whyUsa.section1Desc: America is a market where investor rights are strongly protected. Property rights and contracts are clear, market data is transparent, and long-term appreciation potential is high.
whyUsa.section2Desc: While income in local currencies often erodes against the dollar, rental income in the USA comes in dollars. Your purchasing power stays stable, and portfolio growth becomes more predictable.
whyUsa.section3Desc: In the USA, transactions typically go through a Title Company. This structure protects both parties by controlling title, money, and documentation. Records are auditable and processes are standard.
whyUsa.section4Desc: Government-backed rental programs provide significant advantages in PASIFLOW's focused models: A portion of rent is paid through the program, collection risk decreases, and cash flow becomes more plannable.
whyUsa.section5Desc: Owning assets in dollars makes your investment more resilient against fluctuations in local currencies.
whyUsa.ctaDesc: Real estate investments in America can have different tax advantages. Review our detailed guide to plan the most suitable structure together.

taxation.title: Taxation & Legal Structure
taxation.subtitle: Real Estate Investment in America
taxation.intro: Real estate investment is not just about earning rental income; you can also create higher net returns and sustainable financial structure through tax planning.
taxation.section1Desc: There is a Double Taxation Treaty between Turkey and the USA. You can deduct the rental income you earn in the USA when declaring in Turkey, avoiding double taxation on the same income.
taxation.section2Desc: PASIFLOW sets up LLC companies for investors. It provides Pass-Through taxation — you don't pay separate tax at the company level. It protects you from legal risks and separates your personal assets.
taxation.section3Desc: Besides being a property owner in the USA, you can deduct various expenses from your tax base: Property tax and insurance, management and maintenance costs, travel expenses, mortgage interest, and depreciation.
taxation.section4Desc: Depreciation is a particularly important advantage: You can reduce your tax base by deducting the structural portion of the property over the years. This reduces your annual tax burden to almost zero.
taxation.section5Desc: As PASIFLOW, we provide full support to our investors including annual tax reporting, preparation of official declarations, legal file tracking, and guidance from tax experts.
taxation.lifecycle1: Your property generates rent throughout the year
taxation.lifecycle3: Calculates depreciation and other deductible items
taxation.lifecycle4: Prepares and submits your declaration during tax season
taxation.lifecycle5: Provides reports for deduction in Turkey when needed
taxation.ctaDesc: The tax system in America may seem complex at first. However, with a transparent process, professional support, and proper planning, you can get maximum benefit from your investment.
